query:
INSERT INTO initiatives (title, description, submittedBy, department, estimatedCost, status, effortScore, returnScore, riskScore, revenueImpact) VALUES 
('AI Social Media Content Generator', 'Deploy AI tool to automatically generate engaging social media posts, captions, and hashtags for vacation destinations. Integrates with existing social platforms and brand guidelines. Quick setup with existing AI APIs.', 'Sarah Chen', 'Marketing', 25000, 'pending-review', 3, 8, 2, 150000),
('Email Campaign A/B Testing Automation', 'AI-powered system that automatically tests subject lines, send times, and content variations to optimize email open and click rates. Integrates with existing email platform.', 'Michael Rodriguez', 'Marketing', 18000, 'pending-review', 2, 7, 1, 200000),
('Predictive Customer Lifetime Value Model', 'Machine learning model that predicts customer lifetime value and churn probability. Enables targeted retention campaigns and personalized offers. Requires data pipeline setup and model training.', 'Jennifer Park', 'Marketing', 120000, 'pending-review', 7, 9, 4, 800000),
('AI-Powered Marketing Analytics Dashboard', 'Unified dashboard with AI-driven insights that automatically identifies trends, anomalies, and optimization opportunities across all marketing channels. Includes predictive forecasting and automated reporting.', 'David Thompson', 'Marketing', 95000, 'pending-review', 6, 8, 3, 500000),
('AI Image Enhancement for Marketing Materials', 'AI tool that automatically enhances vacation photos for marketing use: removes backgrounds, adjusts lighting, upscales resolution. Saves manual editing time.', 'Amanda Foster', 'Marketing', 12000, 'pending-review', 2, 4, 1, 50000),
('Custom AI Video Production Platform', 'Build custom platform that uses AI to automatically create promotional videos from destination photos and templates. Requires significant development and video processing infrastructure.', 'Robert Kim', 'Marketing', 250000, 'pending-review', 9, 5, 7, 180000);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user oYC4Lz5DqbQiGEf.root --database LVN2BBaghCkJZKnQ9H5R4v --execute INSERT INTO initiatives (title, description, submittedBy, department, estimatedCost, status, effortScore, returnScore, riskScore, revenueImpact) VALUES 
('AI Social Media Content Generator', 'Deploy AI tool to automatically generate engaging social media posts, captions, and hashtags for vacation destinations. Integrates with existing social platforms and brand guidelines. Quick setup with existing AI APIs.', 'Sarah Chen', 'Marketing', 25000, 'pending-review', 3, 8, 2, 150000),
('Email Campaign A/B Testing Automation', 'AI-powered system that automatically tests subject lines, send times, and content variations to optimize email open and click rates. Integrates with existing email platform.', 'Michael Rodriguez', 'Marketing', 18000, 'pending-review', 2, 7, 1, 200000),
('Predictive Customer Lifetime Value Model', 'Machine learning model that predicts customer lifetime value and churn probability. Enables targeted retention campaigns and personalized offers. Requires data pipeline setup and model training.', 'Jennifer Park', 'Marketing', 120000, 'pending-review', 7, 9, 4, 800000),
('AI-Powered Marketing Analytics Dashboard', 'Unified dashboard with AI-driven insights that automatically identifies trends, anomalies, and optimization opportunities across all marketing channels. Includes predictive forecasting and automated reporting.', 'David Thompson', 'Marketing', 95000, 'pending-review', 6, 8, 3, 500000),
('AI Image Enhancement for Marketing Materials', 'AI tool that automatically enhances vacation photos for marketing use: removes backgrounds, adjusts lighting, upscales resolution. Saves manual editing time.', 'Amanda Foster', 'Marketing', 12000, 'pending-review', 2, 4, 1, 50000),
('Custom AI Video Production Platform', 'Build custom platform that uses AI to automatically create promotional videos from destination photos and templates. Requires significant development and video processing infrastructure.', 'Robert Kim', 'Marketing', 250000, 'pending-review', 9, 5, 7, 180000);
